title: Leka Big Wheel
description: A personalized fishing reel not only offers outstanding performance but also blends seamlessly with your unique style, providing you with a one-of-a-kind experience.
detail_description: Every detail is meticulously crafted to ensure each of your fishing experiences is of the highest quality.
color_description_1: Special colors are custom-made; they are personalized colors and therefore cannot be returned or exchanged.
color_description_2: Due to the custom nature of these orders, production time is longer. It is recommended to communicate with the craftsman beforehand.
price_and_size_description_1: Add $700 for a patented swivel base (360-degree rotation).
price_and_size_description_2: Special carbon fiber: The handle is positioned for less effort when a fish is on the line!
